title: HOTD: One-Eyed Monsters
description:
On the latest very, very dark episode of House of the Dragon, there's a funeral, some incest, eye gouging, and a dragon violation. And shockingly, this was actually heartwarming.  Go figure.  What we could see we loved!

Watch with Crappens on Demand here:  https://www.patreon.com/posts/72842275?pr=true

Listen here:  https://winter-is-crappening.simplecast.com/episodes/hotd-one-eyed-monsters
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
